page.title: 16RELIGION IN KIRKBY LONSDALE
page.content: During the last decade,religious attendance at the{Parish Church}has soared because{St. Mary's}has become the mother church for 7 other villages around the area.There is now a team ministery with a{Rector}and{Vicar.}The other churches are used but do not support their own clergy.Because of this sudden increase,the Church has been made open for every generation and now has a lively family atmosphere.As the{local primary school is a{Church School,}the clergy play an important role in the welfare of the children and the appointment of the teachers.The hope is that in the future there will be close cooperation between them all.
